task.summary: Default task
.idea: files for intellij-idea project, Game2D.iml: same, Game2d.java: changed to JPanel and some private variables to public, GameWindow.java: new class to manage main window
added menu prototype, no graphics in commit - download from http://ctrlz.info/~public/Game2d/
cleaned GameMenu.java a bit, added menu skipping by adding show_menu=0 to config
cleaned GameMenu.java a bit, added menu skipping by adding show_menu=0 to config
last commit message wrong; added rudimentary sound support, can play .wav files
change GameMenu and GameWindow to use javafx instead of swing, changed some gfx filenames (need updated gfx.zip: http://ctrlz.info/~public/Game2D/)
changed from swing to javafx, changed keycodes to be stored in javafx KeyCode not in int
renamed some variables in method bytesToInt for more readability
fixed compile error in map and changed to use TimeLine for gameLoop, which grants us doublebuffering to fix flickering issue
added simple setup for keybindings and an example where escape -> pause/unpause
removed old uncommented code and added some comments / examples, fixed skipping menu setting not working, removed some unused variables/methods
added sound capabilities and a mute keybind (ingame: O)
fixed crashing thread and mute now works on sound-effects too, added a bunch of TODOs..
added option to turn off sound completely, added sound_enabled to config.properties file, defaulting as "false" untill completed.
fixed error from merge in CharMechanics and added attack sound again, slight cleanup and enabled sound by default

made everything into using packages and (somewhat) of a logical structure - still a lot of cleanup necessary for relations/interconnections to be logical/obvious. sfx -> resource folder, gfx and maps -> normal folders. Main class: game2d.core.GameWindow
simplified package structure, made sound automatically disable itself if it doesnt find sound files
changed sound to use new File instead of getResource, assumes sfx/ directory is in project root/work directory
Made SoundController static, added incrementVolume and decrementVolume bound to + and - in-game
updated .gitignore to include syncthing files
light cleanup
light cleanup (fix)
